title: Looking for Hebrew font called: Sefer Torah Sans Script for Mac
content:
Greetings all,

I am trying to find and purchase a Hebrew font (Macintosh format) called "Sefer Torah Sans Script" or one very similar. Have looked everywhere but can't find one.

See attached image.

Please advise,

Thank you,

Josh

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141227183040im_/http:/typophile.com/files/STSS_S_3417_5541.jpg)
author: brenner30
